attributes.action: to create a most wonderful piece of music for her majesty the queen
attributes.additional_details: A life long goal of mine has been tø compose the most wonderful piece of music to produce to our beloved Queen of England. A very well deserved piece of music to thank her for the wonderful things she has done for iour country, and to praise her for her perfect control throughout all the times of danger and sadness along all the many years of her reign. I hope you will join me in giving her the only gift I can. A gift that can remain for hundreds of years in her memory, and one which can be be appreciated all over the world no matter the origin of the listener. A gift for everone tø enjoy, to come together and say "she is, was and always will be a strong, steady monarch and a wonderful lady that will always do us good to be a little more alike". Join me, be a part of it and help to give an amazing woman an amazing, well remembered history.
